revision.text: '''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to a [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] account, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
